"SafeRide
" "Created by Zeina Amhaz and Emily Masten

"
"SafeRide is an application meant to make calling Safe Ride on campus easier and quicker." "We are planning to continue working on this app this summer and next year, hoping to " "have it done and ready to be launched by the end of next year. For our final project, " "we implemented the main basics and important background parts.

"
"Check the Help page for how the app works. If there is anything that we can do differently," " more efficiently, or just better, we would love your opinion and input!"

"How to use SafeRide

"
"User:
" "1. Press "Set PickUp" to request a driver to come pick you up.
" "2. Set your current location, destination, number of people, and whether of not this is " "an emergency.
" "3. Press "Messages" to see get notifications from driver (ie whether or not the driver " "has accepted the request and has arrived).

"
"Driver:
" "1. Press "Refresh" to see if a request is waiting for you.
" "2. When there is a new request, a dialog fragment pops up notifying you of the person " "requesting a drive, their location, their destination, number of people, and whether or " "not it's an emergency.
" "3. When you have arrived at their location, press "Arriving" to notify the user.
" "4. When you have dropped the person off, press "Dropped Off" to go back to refreshing " "for new requests."
